title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2™
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese.  The Amazing Spider-Man 2 takes place outside the events of the 2nd film in a unique story where Spider-Man discovers a larger threat to NYC that has turned the underworld upside down. Villains from the film and classic Marvel characters are woven together in a twisted web of adrenaline-fueled, web-slinging action that puts players on a collision course with an evil far beyond Spider-Man’s reckoning. • Play as Peter Parker for the first time ever in The Amazing Spider-Man game series. • Battle all-new villains from both the movie and Spider-Man universes. • New web-swing mechanic includes expanded web-shooter capabilities and chemical properties that allow you to freeze and blow up items on impact. • Explore a more expansive Manhattan cityscape than the previous Amazing Spider-Man. •  New “Hero or Menace” system rewards you for acting as Spider-Man by stopping crime and saving citizens. • New abilities and expanded fast-paced, acrobatic combat moves bring players up close and personal.

childDownloads.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2™
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese.  The Amazing Spider-Man 2 takes place outside the events of the 2nd film in a unique story where Spider-Man discovers a larger threat to NYC that has turned the underworld upside down. Villains from the film and classic Marvel characters are woven together in a twisted web of adrenaline-fueled, web-slinging action that puts players on a collision course with an evil far beyond Spider-Man’s reckoning. • Play as Peter Parker for the first time ever in The Amazing Spider-Man game series. • Battle all-new villains from both the movie and Spider-Man universes. • New web-swing mechanic includes expanded web-shooter capabilities and chemical properties that allow you to freeze and blow up items on impact. • Explore a more expansive Manhattan cityscape than the previous Amazing Spider-Man. •  New “Hero or Menace” system rewards you for acting as Spider-Man by stopping crime and saving citizens. • New abilities and expanded fast-paced, acrobatic combat moves bring players up close and personal.

childDownloads.title: BLACK SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Pre-Order Suit Pack and owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack Bundle already own this content and should not purchase this item.  Spider-Man’s black costume harbored a deadly secret: it was an alien symbiote that later became Venom! In-game abilities include: •DAMAGE: Base attacks cause more damage •BONUS TECH: Tech pieces have higher value than normal •DURABILITY: Any damage towards SM is reduced

childDownloads.title: COSMIC SPIDER-MAN SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Pre-Order Suit Pack and owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack Bundle already own this content and should not purchase this item.  In times of great danger, the universe temporarily bestows cosmic power upon worthy individuals. On this occasion, the chosen one was Spider-Man! In-game abilities include: •HEALING RATE: Spider-Man heals faster •SPIDER-SENSE RANGE: Spider-Sense goes further than normal •IONIC POTENCY: Ionic web reacts more rapidly

childDownloads.title: ELECTRO-PROOF SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack already own this content and should not purchase this item.  Spider-Man fashioned a heavily insulated suit that could protect him from lethal doses of electric currents! In-game abilities include: •ELECTRIC RESISTANCE: Electric damage is reduced and web abilities are reactivated more quickly •SHOOTING RATE: Shoot faster with web-shooters •STICKY DURATION: Enemies and objects stay sticky longer than normal

childDownloads.title: ENDS OF THE EARTH SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack already own this content and should not purchase this item.  To face a world-ending threat from the Sinister Six, Spider-Man combined several earlier suits, giving him armor, the power of flight, and energy blasts, among other weapons! In-game abilities include: •BLUNT RESISTANCE: Damage caused by blunt weapons are reduced •DURABILITY: Any damage towards Spider-Man is reduced •SEISMIC BLAST CHARGE RATE: Seismic blast ability charges faster

childDownloads.title: IRON SPIDER SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Pre-Order Suit Pack and owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack Bundle already own this content and should not purchase this item.  The Iron Spider armor enhances Spidey’s natural abilities with cutting-edge technology! In-game abilities include: •DURABILITY: Any damage towards Spider-Man is reduced •FIRE RESISTANCE: Fire damage is reduced •BALLISTIC RESISTANCE: Damage caused by ballistic weapons are reduced

childDownloads.title: SPIDER-MAN NOIR SUIT
childDownloads.description: Owners of the Web Threads Pre-Order Suit Pack and owners of the Web Threads Suit Pack Bundle already own this content and should not purchase this item.  In a parallel universe, Peter Parker was raised by his Aunt May and Uncle Ben during the Great Depression. After Ben was murdered, Peter battled crime and injustice in the 1930s as Spider-Man Noir! In-game abilities include: •STEALTH: Move closer to enemies without being seen •TAKEDOWN RANGE: Range at which Spider-Man can trigger a takedown is increased •BALLISTIC RESISTANCE: Damage caused by ballistic weapons are reduced

childDownloads.title: WEB THREADS SUIT PACK
childDownloads.description: Customize Spider-Man with these six sleek, super-powered suits that offer unique combat bonuses throughout The Amazing Spider-Man 2 video game!  Web Threads Suit Pack Includes: •NEW! Super-charged, electric resistant Electro-Proof Suit •NEW! Anti-Sinister Six armor, Ends of the Earth Suit •Cutting-edge design, red and gold Iron Spider Suit •Stellar, blue and white Cosmic Spider-Man Suit •All-consuming, Venom-like Black Suit •Pulp-style Spider-Man Noir Suit
